translation.en: -[Toronto] Okay. That's very nice. -Back off. No problem.

translation.en: Well, thank you for a delicious meal, man.

translation.en: -That's a one. Yeah. -Hmm.

translation.en: I want Debora back.

translation.en: The chassis was cut in half. The engine practically evaporated.

translation.en: She's gone.

translation.en: -That's your problem. -Cut the shit!

translation.en: Yeah! Way to go, guys.

translation.en: Welcome. Welcome to Teddybox.

translation.en: I, of course, am Teddy Jackson, and guess what?

translation.en: Here, the only opponent is yourself. Don't you forget it.

translation.en: We're brick-and-mortar now, guys, which means things are changing.

translation.en: They're getting bigger and better!

translation.en: And we're bringing you one online class per week!
translation.vi: Và sẽ có một lớp học trực tuyến mỗi tuần!

translation.en: That means I can talk to you guys live.

translation.en: And today, we got our first ever online call.

translation.en: Uh, calling all the way from Toronto.

translation.en: Um, okay. [laughs]

translation.en: Talk to me.

translation.en: That's graphic.

translation.en: That's… That's a lot, sir. I wanna remind you that we're live.

translation.en: We got about 8,000 viewers in here right now, not to mention kids.

translation.en: -So we keep-- -I miss her.

translation.en: Debora.
translation.vi: Debora.

translation.en: You killed her.

translation.en: Oh, stop that.

translation.en: Not while we're live.

translation.en: You don't tell anybody they killed somebody, especially without proof.

translation.en: That's what we call a strong accusation.

translation.en: Not true at all.

translation.en: Maybe I should come down there and non-contact your face.

translation.en: Or not, sir.

translation.en: This is online, so you don't have to come all the way from Toronto
translation.vi: Cái này trực tuyến, nên không cần phải đi từ tận Toronto

translation.en: when you can talk to me now.
translation.vi: khi giờ có thể nói luôn.

translation.en: -That's the beauty. -I'm not in Toronto, Teddy.

translation.en: What does that mean? What are you saying?

translation.en: Where are you?

translation.en: I'm standing outside.

translation.en: Oh, [bleep]!
